ComicInfo.Title: If This Be Death..!
ComicInfo.Summary: If This Be Death..!: Thor and his allies battle against Pluto and his hordes from Hades. Thor tackles Pluto one-on-one and is felled. Pluto raises his axe to decapitate Thor - -
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:17:44. [Issue ID 25120]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
